text: Orville Clarence Redenbacher (July 16, 1907 â€“ September 19, 1995) was an American businessman. He was most often associated with the brand of popcorn called Orville Redenbacher's. Redenbacher was born on July 16, 1907 in Brazil, Indiana. He studied at Purdue University. Redenbacher was married to Corinne Strate from 1928 until her death in 1971. He was married to Nina Redenbacher from 1971 until her death in 1991. Redenbacher died on September 19, 1995. He drowned after having a heart attack in the Jacuzzi in his Coronado, California home, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Orville Redenbacher Popcorn * Category:1907 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Brazil, Indiana Category:Accidental deaths by drowning in the United States Category:American botanists Category:Businesspeople from Indiana
title: Orville Redenbacher
